title: Matplotlib RGB Channels Visualization
description: Matplotlib is a popular data visualization library in Python. It provides various plotting tools, including 2D and 3D plotting capabilities. In this tutorial, we will use the RGBAxes module of the AxesGrid toolkit in Matplotlib to display RGB channels.

meta.title: Matplotlib RGB Channels Visualization
meta.description: Learn how to use Matplotlib's RGBAxes module to display RGB channels of an image.
meta.keywords: matplotlib, python, data visualization, rgb, channels
